name: Arham Habib
headerTaglineTwo: prev QT intern @ Citsec, founder @ VO2

projects.title: NFL Big Data Bowl
projects.description: Attributing defended yards to specific players

projects.title: Swipe Exchange
projects.description: UPenn's secondary market for meal swipes

projects.title: Hedged
projects.description: Open-source hegding strategies for construction supply chains.

services.title: Data science
services.description: Past projects include a trading algorithms on prediction markets, a coffee-optimizing project built on top of Oura's API, and a volatility surface interpolator.

services.title: Trading
services.description: As a quant trading intern at Citadel Securities, I worked on better parametrizing volatility spreads between indeces and pricing volatility in high-yield and investment-grade corporate bonds.

services.title: Smart Contracts
services.description: I've developed in Solidity and Web3.js. Past projects include an arbitrage bot for prediction markets, a DEX indexed to invest in athlete performance and a order-book style marketplace for ERC-1155 tokens.

services.title: Investment vehicles
services.description: I've created and deployed SPVs to facilitate Charlton Athletic (a Premier League football team)'s player acquisition. LPs earn from future player sell-ons. $2M raised, legal process facilitated by Assure.

media.title: Swipe Exchange
media.description: Interview about building a secondary meal swipe market @ UPenn and getting a cease and desist letter.

media.title: SportTechie
media.description: Interview with SportTechie on VO2 and the future of fan engagement.

media.title: Young Money
media.description: Podcast on founding young and building wealth

media.title: Forward Thinking Founders
media.description: Podcast on my journey as a young founder

aboutpara0: I spent last summer as a quant trading intern at Citadel Securities on the Block and FICC teams. There, I designed systematic strategies to trade index spreads and price HYG vol, respectively.
aboutpara1: I'm the former cofounder of VO2: backed by Techstars, Rough Draft Ventures, and Eberg Capital, sold to Divider in Feb 2023.
aboutpara2: I'm trying to learn more about ML/RL, math, and commodities.
aboutpara3: I enjoy prediction markets, sports betting, and trading crypto vol. In my free time, I love hiking, playing squash, and skiing.
aboutpara4: In high school, I competed for the USA Debate Team, wrote a script that got me banned from Twitter, and helped create Karachi's first public debate league. If you want to reach out, contact me at arham.habib@gmail.com.
